DOC.brief_summary: The main purpose prospective , multicentre , french observational study analyse evolution pulse pressure ( PP ) identify prognostic factor hypertensive patient three month initiation new hypertensive therapy . The PP define difference systolic blood pressure ( SBP ) diastolic blood pressure ( DBP ) .
DOC.brief_title: Evolution Pulse Pressure Following Initiation Antihypertensive Therapy Patients With Essential Arterial Hypertension
DOC.criteria: Patients essential arterial hypertension need new antihypertensive therapy A patient include physician he/she agree inform study
